org.apache.beam.it.gcp.storage

Class GcsResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.it.gcp.storage.GcsResourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.beam.it.common.ResourceManager, ArtifactClient

    public final class GcsResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArtifactClient, org.apache.beam.it.common.ResourceManager
    Client for working with test artifacts stored in Google Cloud Storage (GCS).

    Tests should store this as a static value of the class and call ArtifactClient.cleanupAll() in the @AfterClass method.

      • copyFileToGcs

        public Artifact copyFileToGcs(java.nio.file.Path localPath,
                              java.lang.String objectName)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Copies a file from a local path to a specified object name in Google Cloud Storage.
        Parameters:
        localPath - the path of the file to be copied.
        objectName - the name of the object to be created in Google Cloud Storage.
        Returns:
        the URI of the copied object in Google Cloud Storage.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error reading the file at the specified local path.

        Lists all artifacts under test-class-name/run-id/prefix.
        Specified by:
        listArtifacts in interface ArtifactClient
        Parameters:
        testName - the test name to use as the prefix on the testing artifacts.
        regex - a regex to use for filtering out unwanted artifacts
        Returns:
        all the artifacts whose name matches regex

      • listArtifacts

        public java.util.List<Artifact> listArtifacts(java.lang.String prefix,
                                              java.util.regex.Pattern regex)
        Description copied from interface: ArtifactClient
        Lists all artifacts under test-class-name/run-id/prefix.
        Specified by:
        listArtifacts in interface ArtifactClient
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix to use along with the fixed values method above. This must include the test-method-name value, but it can include other directories or files under it.
        regex - a regex to use for filtering out unwanted artifacts
        Returns:
        all the artifacts whose name matches regex

      • createNotification

        public com.google.cloud.storage.Notification createNotification(java.lang.String topicName,
                                                                java.lang.String gcsPrefix)
        Creates a new notification for the given topic and GCS prefix.
        Parameters:
        topicName - the name of the Pub/Sub topic to which the notification should be sent.
        gcsPrefix - the prefix of the object names to which the notification applies.
        Returns:
        the created notification.
